Q_THE_WAY_IS_SHUT.title: The Way is Shut
Q_THE_WAY_IS_SHUT.description: The path ahead is blocked by a mysterious, shimmering barrier. Two pedestals stand before it, one glowing with a soft blue light, the other with a fiery red.

STEP_01_CHOOSE_PEDESTAL.description: You must choose a pedestal to touch.

STEP_02_BLUE_PATH.description: You chose the path of wisdom. The barrier fades, revealing a library filled with ancient tomes. An open book on a nearby lectern catches your eye.

STEP_02_RED_PATH.description: You chose the path of courage. The barrier shatters, revealing a training ground with weapons of every description.

step_reward.details: You feel a surge of strength.

STEP_03_LEARN_PEDAGOGY.description: The book is open to a page defining a key concept in instructional design. You study the page for a moment.

choices.text: Continue your exploration of the library.
[Pedagogy] Discuss the book's teaching methods with the library's curator.

STEP_04_LIBRARY_EXIT.description: You find a quiet exit at the back of the library.

STEP_05_CURATOR_CONVERSATION.description: The curator is impressed by your understanding of pedagogy and offers you a rare tome.
